text: The 2019 FIBA U18 Women's European Championship Division B was the 15th edition of the Division B of the FIBA U18 Women's European Championship, the second tier of the European women's under-18 basketball championship. It was played in Skopje, North Macedonia, from 5 to 14 July 2019.Official website Finland women's national under-18 basketball team won the tournament. ==Participating teams== * * * * * * * * * * (14th place, 2018 FIBA U18 Women's European Championship Division A) * * * * * * * * * (16th place, 2018 FIBA U18 Women's European Championship Division A) * (15th place, 2018 FIBA U18 Women's European Championship Division A) * * * ==First round== === Group A === === Group B === === Group C === === Group D === ==17th–23rd place classification== ===Group E=== ===Playoffs=== ==9th–16th place playoffs== ==Championship playoffs== == Final standings == {| class="infobox bordered" |- |width=20px bgcolor="#ccffcc"| || Promoted to 2020 FIBA U18 Women's European Championship Division A |} {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center" |- ! width=50|Rank ! width=200|Team |-bgcolor=#ccffcc | ||align=left| |-bgcolor=#ccffcc | ||align=left| |-bgcolor=#ccffcc | ||align=left| |- | 4 ||align=left| |- | 5 ||align=left| |- | 6 ||align=left| |- | 7 ||align=left| |- | 8 ||align=left| |- | 9 ||align=left| |- | 10 ||align=left| |- | 11 ||align=left| |- | 12 ||align=left| |- | 13 ||align=left| |- | 14 ||align=left| |- | 15 ||align=left| |- | 16 ||align=left| |- | 17 ||align=left| |- | 18 ||align=left| |- | 19 ||align=left| |- | 20 ||align=left| |- | 21 ||align=left| |- | 22 ||align=left| |- | 23 ||align=left| |} ==References== 2019 Category:2019–20 in European women's basketball FIBA Europe Category:International youth basketball competitions hosted by North Macedonia Category:Sports competitions in Skopje FIBA U18 FIBA
